Analysis methods overview
=========================
All analysis functions distributed with the base version of the *framework* can be found below.

Plot system data
----------------
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.plot_model

Plotting concentrations graph
-----------------------------
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.plot_concentrations

Alternative range of initial guess values solver
------------------------------------------------
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.range_solver
 
Mean squared error landscape
----------------------------
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.landscape

1D landscape
^^^^^^^^^^^^
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.landscape_1d

2D landscape
^^^^^^^^^^^^
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.landscape_2d

Parameter confidence intervals
------------------------------
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.confidence_interval

Parameter sensitivity analysis
------------------------------
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.parameter_sensitivity
  
Plot residuals
--------------
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.residuals	

Automated input outlier detection
---------------------------------
.. autofunction:: src.post_process.outlier
